### Advance Contract Award Notice

#### Title and Reference Number

* Elder Helper Services - L’assistant de l’Aîné
* Reference Number: cb-41-51559066
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: 50601-23-006
* Publication Date: April 27, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 15, 2023 15:00:00

#### Description

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide Elder Helper Services to support Indigenous programming and meet the needs of Indigenous offenders. The services include assisting and supplementing the work of Elders, providing counseling and guidance, conducting group discussions, and supporting case management and parole processes.

#### Requirements

* The contractor must have a minimum of two (2) years of cumulative experience in assisting and supporting Elders, providing counseling and guidance, conducting group discussions, and assisting others in preparing reports.
* The contractor must demonstrate in writing that they have the knowledge and experience required to perform the tasks outlined in this notice.
* The contractor must provide a resume and two (2) references who can confirm their work as an Elder Helper.
* The contractor must have the ability to work in English and meet the requirements outlined in the Security Requirements Check List (Annex C).

#### Procurement Method

This procurement is open to Indigenous suppliers only, in accordance with the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

#### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Janet Nelson
* Email: 501contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca
* Phone: (306) 659-9300
* Address: 3427 Faithfull Avenue, SASKATOON, SK S7K 8H6

#### Evaluation Criteria

* The contractor must demonstrate that they meet the requirements outlined in this notice, including previous experience, knowledge, and ability to perform the tasks outlined.
* The contractor must provide a clear and concise statement of capabilities that outlines how they will meet the requirements outlined in this notice.

#### Closing Date and Time

May 15, 2023 15:00:00
